1370: Gheram was born in Nieu straet in 1370.
Got married to Machtilden at age 19 in 1370.
Had a son with Machtilden, Iordanus, at age 19.
1371: Had a son with Machtilden, Lutgeri, at age 20.
1372: Had a son with Machtilden, Ghodekin, at age 21.
1375: Had a son with Machtilden, Lubertus, at age 24.
1376: Had a son with Machtilden, Sollen, at age 25.
1381: Had a daughter with Machtilden, Esa, at age 30.
1382: Had a son with Machtilden, Erenboede, at age 31.
1386: Had a daughter with Machtilden, Salome, at age 35.
1390: Lost son Erenboede when Erenboede was 9 years old.
1391: Had a son with Machtilden, Woubbrecht, at age 40.
